raw_user_story: As a GitHub user, I want to star repositories I'm interested in, so that I can bookmark repos for later reference and show appreciation for projects I find valuable.
raw_criteria: List repositories a user has starred
List users who starred a repository
Check if user has starred a repository
raw_rules: A user can star a repository only once
Stars must reference valid users and repositories
Timestamps must be recorded when stars are created
Unstarring is idempotent - no error if already unstarred

excluded: Star count aggregation (can be computed from queries)
